name: Upfront Business Development
description: With experience in all marketing, digital and communications disciplines, over the last 10 years we have helped our clients to win over £100 million in new business.

team.title: Founder and Managing Director
team.name: Jody Osman
team.bioHtml: Founder @Upfront Business Development, @Stay Upstream

team.name: Jody Osman
team.bioHtml: Founder @Upfront Business Development, @Stay Upstream

jobs.title: Account Manager
jobs.description:
As Account Manager, you will work across a range of client accounts to ensure we are developing joined up business development programmes for our clients. This will include developing well targeted campaigns, events and engaging content - all managed as part of an ongoing contact programme.

You will also be responsible for ensuring we deliver excellent client services to each of our clients. You will report directly Business Development Director  and work alongside the Business Development team. As part of your team you will work closely with data and content teams.

Objectives 
-	Secure and strengthen the relationships with existing Upfront clients 
-	Ensure high retention and long-term client relationships
-	Make sure new clients are effectively set up and on-boarded
-	Develop and manage effective rolling campaign plans for clients
-	Ensure excellent client services and regular communication
-	Develop efficient ways of working across all teams

The elements of the role: 

- Setting up new clients
•	Involvement in new client on-boarding
•	Undertaking research and insight to feed into process 
•	Contributing to development of client programme
•	Develop on-boarding documentation 
•	Manage client set up

 - Managing client relationships
•	Key contact for clients, with involvement in weekly calls and monthly meetings 
•	Ensuring regular and effective communication / reporting between Upfront and clients
•	Involvement in regular and proactive client reviews 
•	Conduct regular client feedback – understand relationship status

 - Campaign management
•	Produce and manage quarterly client campaign plans
•	Develop and deliver well targeted, robust and effective, multi-channel client programmes 
•	Monthly resource management to include data, communications, events,  social and Business Development activity

Remuneration
A good competitive salary will be offered with significant opportunity for growth in the future.

You will also be responsible for ensuring we deliver excellent client services to each of our clients. You will report directly Business Development Director and work alongside the Business Development team. As part of your team you will work closely with data and content teams.

Objectives

  • Make sure new clients are effectively set up and on-boarded

    • Develop on-boarding documentation
    • Manage client set up

    • Managing client relationships • Key contact for clients, with involvement in weekly calls and monthly meetings • Ensuring regular and effective communication / reporting between Upfront and clients • Involvement in regular and proactive client reviews • Conduct regular client feedback – understand relationship status
    • Campaign management • Produce and manage quarterly client campaign plans • Develop and deliver well targeted, robust and effective, multi-channel client programmes • Monthly resource management to include data, communications, events, social and Business Development activity

Remuneration
A good competitive salary will be offered with significant opportunity for growth in the future.

jobs.title: Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Business Development Manager to join our experienced team. You will have some experience of B2B sales / new business and a good grasp of the marketing industry.
 
You will be responsible for managing a portfolio of client accounts (agencies and Martech businesses) where you will be involved in devising and developing targeted new business programmes for each, including content, events and lead generation activity.

Representing each client, you will be responsible for managing ongoing follow up and keep in touch activity to drive through pipeline opportunities and new business wins for your clients, as well as managing day to day client relationships.
 
This is an exciting role for someone who is looking to advance their career in business development and work closely with some of the UK's most exciting agencies and fast growing Martech players. It will provide unrivalled experience and insight into a wide range of disciplines and sectors - and as an employer we are committed to your development with good potential for role progression..
 
Desired Skills and Experience:

1-2 years+ B2B sales experience
Awareness and interest in the marketing / martech industry 
Knowledge of individual marketing disciplines
Excellent communication skills and good on the phone
Proactive and resourceful, can spot a good lead
The ability to express and sell an idea clearly
Ambitious and results orientated
 
The elements of the role:

- Secure and strengthen the relationships with existing Upfront clients
- Help win new clients and drive growth
- To deliver new business success for each client
- Contribute to company growth targets
- Great potential for regular bonus and commission

Future Development:

Additional involvement in campaign strategy and planning
Manage a team 
Involvement in Upfront new business activity (including f2f meetings and pitches)
